  • 布局规划策略文件 (.xml)
  • 查看页面源码

布局规划策略文件 (.xml)

布局规划策略文件旨在为不同FPGA架构和PDK提供可扩展且自适应的布局规划方法。该文件在创建或加载流片项目时加载（详见 架构模板文件 (.xml)）:numref:fig_floorplan_concepts 图示了适用于布局规划的关键概念，本节将详细阐述。

文件示例如下所示。

保留字

保留字可用于定义变量

CPP

PDK配置中标准单元定义的*接触点多晶硅间距*（CPP）（详见 标准单元）。

备注

仅考虑门级网表中使用的标准单元库的CPP和高度值，且所有使用的标准单元库必须具有相同的CPP和高度。

SC_HEIGHT

PDK配置中标准单元定义的标准单元高度值（详见 标准单元）

General Settings

boundary_cell_width="<string>"

Define the minimum width per tile which should be reserved for boundary cells. Note that the width must be a multiply of CPP. For example, CPP*4 represents for a minimum width of four CPP should be reserved when sizing the dimension a tile.

height_width_ratio="<float>"

Define the ratio between height and width when sizing the dimension of a tile. For example, a ratio of 1 indicates that each tile will be sized in a square shape, while a ratio of 0.5 or 2.0 indicates that each tile will be sized in a rectangle shape.

Tile Utilization

The utilization rate for each tile can be defined under the node tile_utilization. A utilization rate denotes the percentage of cell area in the total area of a tile. For each tile, a specific utilization rate can be defined through the child node tile

备注

A 100% utilization may not be achievable in practice. A typically range is between 70% and 95%, depending on the optmization techniques during physical design steps.

default="<float>"

The default utilization rate applicable to all the tiles if not defined explicitedly. Must be in the range of (0, 1], where 0 represents 0% while 1 represents 100%

name="<string>"

Specify the name of the tile where a custom utilization rate should be defined. Note that the tile name should match one of the tiles which can be checked through command report_module_names (See details in report_module_names)

Tile gap

Define the horizental and vertical gap between tiles under the node tile_gap. The horizental gap should be under the child node horizental in the unit of CPP (See details in 保留字). The vertical gap should be under the child node vertical in the unit of SC_HEIGHT (See details in 保留字).

边距

在 side_gap 节点下定义 eFPGA 布局边界的最小间距。支持自定义四种类型的边距

  • top 表示 eFPGA 布局顶部边界线的间距

  • right 表示 eFPGA 布局右侧边界线的间距

  • bottom 表示 eFPGA 布局底部边界线的间距

  • left 表示 eFPGA 布局左侧边界线的间距

left 和 right 边距应以 CPP 为单位（详见 保留字）；top 和 bottom 边距应以 SC_HEIGHT 为单位（详见 保留字）
